From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

Catalan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin cōnsūmere, with normal change of conjugation to -ir.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): (Central) [kun.suˈmi]
  • IPA(key): (Balearic) [kon.suˈmi]
  • IPA(key): (Valencia) [kon.suˈmiɾ]
  • Audio (Barcelona):(file)
  • Rhymes: -i(ɾ)

Verb

[edit]

consumir (first-person singular present consumeixo or consumo, first-person singular preterite consumí, past participle consumit)

  1. to consume

Conjugation

[edit]

Derived terms

[edit]
  • consum
  • consumidor

Further reading

[edit]
  • “consumir”, in Diccionari de la llengua catalana [Dictionary of the Catalan Language] (in Catalan), second edition, Institute of Catalan Studies [Catalan: Institut d'Estudis Catalans], April 2007
  • “consumir”, in Gran Diccionari de la Llengua Catalana, Grup Enciclopèdia Catalana, 2025
  • “consumir” in Diccionari normatiu valencià, Acadèmia Valenciana de la Llengua.
  • “consumir” in Diccionari català-valencià-balear, Antoni Maria Alcover and Francesc de Borja Moll, 1962.

Galician

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From Old Galician-Portuguese consumir, consomir, from Latin consumere.

Verb

[edit]

consumir (first-person singular present consumo, third-person singular present consome, first-person singular preterite consumín, past participle consumido)
consumir (first-person singular present consumo, third-person singular present consome, first-person singular preterite consumim or consumi, past participle consumido, reintegrationist norm)

  1. to consume

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of consumir (u-o alternation in present singular)

(eu) 		Second-person
(ti) 		Third-person

Derived terms

[edit]
  • consumidor
  • consumo

Related terms

[edit]
  • sumir

Further reading

[edit]
  • “consumir”, in Dicionario da Real Academia Galega (in Galician), A Coruña: Royal Galician Academy, 2012–2025
  • “consumir”, in Dicionário Estraviz de galego (in Galician), 2014–2025

Portuguese

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From Old Galician-Portuguese consumir, consomir, from Latin cōnsūmere.

Pronunciation

[edit]
 
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /kõ.suˈmi(ʁ)/ [kõ.suˈmi(h)]
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /kõ.suˈmi(ʁ)/ [kõ.suˈmi(h)]
    • (São Paulo) IPA(key): /kõ.suˈmi(ɾ)/
    • (Rio de Janeiro) IPA(key): /kõ.suˈmi(ʁ)/ [kõ.suˈmi(χ)]
    • (Southern Brazil) IPA(key): /kõ.suˈmi(ɻ)/
 
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /kõ.suˈmiɾ/
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /kõ.suˈmiɾ/
    • (Southern Portugal) IPA(key): /kõ.suˈmi.ɾi/

  • Hyphenation: con‧su‧mir

Verb

[edit]

consumir (first-person singular present consumo, third-person singular present consome, first-person singular preterite consumi, past participle consumido)

  1. to consume

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of consumir (u-o alternation in present singular) (See Appendix:Portuguese verbs)
Singular Plural
First-person
(eu) 		Second-person
(tu) 		Third-person
(ele / ela / você) 		First-person
(nós) 		Second-person
(vós) 		Third-person
(eles / elas / vocês)
Infinitive
Impersonal consumir
Personal consumir consumires consumir consumirmos consumirdes consumirem
Gerund
consumindo
Past participle
Masculine consumido consumidos
Feminine consumida consumidas
Indicative
Present consumo consomes consome consumimos consumis consomem
Imperfect consumia consumias consumia consumíamos consumíeis consumiam
Preterite consumi consumiste consumiu consumimos consumistes consumiram
Pluperfect consumira consumiras consumira consumíramos consumíreis consumiram
Future consumirei consumirás consumirá consumiremos consumireis consumirão
Conditional consumiria consumirias consumiria consumiríamos consumiríeis consumiriam
Subjunctive
Present consuma consumas consuma consumamos consumais consumam
Imperfect consumisse consumisses consumisse consumíssemos consumísseis consumissem
Future consumir consumires consumir consumirmos consumirdes consumirem
Imperative
Affirmative consome consuma consumamos consumi consumam
Negative (não) não consumas não consuma não consumamos não consumais não consumam

Derived terms

[edit]
  • consumidor
  • consumo

Descendants

[edit]
  • Macanese: consumí

Further reading

[edit]
  • “consumir” in Dicionário Aberto based on Novo Diccionário da Língua Portuguesa de Cândido de Figueiredo, 1913
  • “consumir”, in Michaelis Dicionário Brasileiro da Língua Portuguesa (in Portuguese), São Paulo: Editora Melhoramentos, 2015–2025
  • “consumir”, in Dicionário Priberam da Língua Portuguesa (in Portuguese), Lisbon: Priberam, 2008–2025

Spanish

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin cōnsūmere, although the base verb was inherited as sumir.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /konsuˈmiɾ/ [kõn.suˈmiɾ]
  • Rhymes: -iɾ
  • Syllabification: con‧su‧mir

Verb

[edit]

consumir (first-person singular present consumo, first-person singular preterite consumí, past participle consumido)

  1. to consume

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of consumir (See Appendix:Spanish verbs)
infinitive consumir
gerund consumiendo
past participle masculine feminine
singular consumido consumida
plural consumidos consumidas
singular plural
1st person 2nd person 3rd person 1st person 2nd person 3rd person
indicative yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ellos/ellas
ustedes
present consumo consumestú
consumísvos 		consume consumimos consumís consumen
imperfect consumía consumías consumía consumíamos consumíais consumían
preterite consumí consumiste consumió consumimos consumisteis consumieron
future consumiré consumirás consumirá consumiremos consumiréis consumirán
conditional consumiría consumirías consumiría consumiríamos consumiríais consumirían
subjunctive yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ellos/ellas
ustedes
present consuma consumastú
consumásvos2 		consuma consumamos consumáis consuman
imperfect
(ra) 		consumiera consumieras consumiera consumiéramos consumierais consumieran
imperfect
(se) 		consumiese consumieses consumiese consumiésemos consumieseis consumiesen
future1 consumiere consumieres consumiere consumiéremos consumiereis consumieren
imperative — tú
vos 		usted nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ustedes
affirmative consumetú
consumívos 		consuma consumamos consumid consuman
negative no consumas no consuma no consumamos no consumáis no consuman

1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.

    Selected combined forms of consumir

These forms are generated automatically and may not actually be used. Pronoun usage varies by region.

singular plural
1st person 2nd person 3rd person 1st person 2nd person 3rd person
with infinitive consumir dative consumirme consumirte consumirle, consumirse consumirnos consumiros consumirles, consumirse

accusative consúmame not used consúmalo, consúmala, consúmase consúmanos not used consúmalos, consúmalas

accusative not used consumámoste consumámoslo, consumámosla consumámonos consumámoos consumámoslos, consumámoslas
with informal second-person plural imperative consumid dative consumidme not used consumidle consumidnos consumíos consumidles
accusative consumidme not used consumidlo, consumidla consumidnos consumíos consumidlos, consumidlas
with formal second-person plural imperative consuman dative consúmanme not used consúmanle consúmannos not used consúmanles, consúmanse
accusative consúmanme not used consúmanlo, consúmanla consúmannos not used consúmanlos, consúmanlas, consúmanse
